description: Inspired by the Aussie classic white Christmas slice, this rum ball recipe is easy to make, and if you don't eat them all yourself, they're perfect to gift to friends and family.
name: White Christmas Rum Balls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line a tray with baking paper. Rest balls, one at a time, on a fork and dip in chocolate mixture to coat. Gently tap fork on bowl edge to allow excess chocolate to drip off. Transfer to coconut and roll to coat. Transfer to tray. Refrigerate for 10 minutes or until set, then serve.
